summary: Feature request to use exception full messages (including stack traces) in workflow and activity task failure logs instead of just logging the exception object. This would improve debugging visibility.
userImpact: Users would have better visibility into workflow and activity failures through more detailed log messages including stack traces.
proposedFix: Use the full_message field when logging exceptions for activities and workflow task failures to include stack trace information.
resolutionDetails: After review, determined that the SDK is already logging the full activity and workflow task failure by sending the exception as a separate log statement which shows the stack trace.
keyQuote: After review, it looks like we are logging the full activity and workflow task failure by sending the exception as a separate log statement which seems to show the stack trace.
